newsitem.title: USA: Wallace Computer supply pact extended.
newsitem.headline: Wallace Computer supply pact extended.

text.p: Wallace Computer Services Inc said Tuesday its two-year supply contract with AmeriNet healthcare organizations has been extended through 2001.
Financial terms were not announced, but Wallace said it has received about $10 million from the original agreement over the last two years.
AmeriNet is made up of more than 6,000 health care organizations in need of business forms, labels and other information management products produced by Wallace.
Wallace shares were off 5/8 Tuesday at 33-1/4.
